author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r33013, correct XFailing test expectation.
(natural_history_filtering): The revision in which a copy is committed is
*not* part of the copy's natural history from the copy source.

author: hwright
msg: Remove use of a deprecated function.

author: ivan
msg: Load crypt32.dll library once in authentication provider initialization,
instead of every time in callback.
Loading/unloading library every time causes random deadlocks in
resolve symbols here. Library will be unloaded on pool clearing.

author: pburba
msg: New merge test to cover bug where valid mergeinfo added in the merge source
is filtered as being part of the target's natural history.

author: stylesen
msg: (SVN_VER_REVISION): Specify the revision number on which this release
